name: ORDER_DICOM_STUDY_INFO
description: This tables contains the DICOM study information.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STUDY_UID
columns.description: The UID of the study in DICOM.

columns.name: SERIES_UID
columns.description: The UID of the series in DICOM.

columns.name: IMAGE_UID
columns.description: The UID of the image in DICOM.
